author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Congress on Wednesday accused the BJP government of encouraging “false” nationalism, criticising them for displaying ‘double standards’ by reversing the decision to name Chandigarh’s international airport after freedom fighter, Bhagat Singh. Congress leader Shobha Oza said the Haryana government has decided the name the airport after an RSS activist Mangal Sen.

“The BJP values an RSS activist’s work more than the martyrdom of Bhagat Singh ji,” she said. “It shows how compromised the BJP is on nationalism..,” she added.
title: BJP encouraging false nationalism: Congress
